titles: Considerations on a book, entituled The theory of the earth, publisht some years since by the Dr. Burnet
author: Beaumont, John, d. 1731.
publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by Randal Taylor ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
